snippet.title: Oz woman held hostage by pugnacious porker
snippet.description:
Oz woman held hostage by pugnacious porker
An animal-loving New South Wales vegetarian has been shown why the only good porker is one sliced into rashers and shoved between two thick slices of bread after being held hostage in her home by an 80kg bald pig, the BBC reports. Caroline Hayes, 63, recounted to Oz media: "It started knocking on my door at 4am, head-butting the â€¦
Lester Haines, 24 Sep 2008
